tasks.task_description: Create data models (AppConfig, GithubConfig, GitHubRelease, GitHubAsset)
Create ShizukuHelper for permissions and file operations

description: Create BitInstaller Android app with TOML config, GitHub API integration, and Shizuku file operations
context: Created build.gradle with all dependencies including OkHttp, Gson, TOML parser, Coroutines, AndroidX libraries, and Shizuku API
Created AndroidManifest.xml with INTERNET and QUERY_ALL_PACKAGES permissions, MainActivity and DownloadActivity declarations
Created apps.toml in assets folder with BitLife configuration
Created data models: AppConfig, GithubConfig, GitHubRelease, GitHubAsset, AppsConfig with proper serialization annotations
Created ConfigLoader class to parse TOML configuration from assets using tomlkt library
Created GitHubApiService using OkHttp and Gson to fetch releases from GitHub API
Created FileDownloader with progress tracking and SHA-256 hash calculation
Created ShizukuHelper for checking availability, requesting permissions, and copying files to app data directories
Created MainViewModel with StateFlow for apps list, loading state, error handling, and download URL resolution
Created all layout files: activity_main.xml with SwipeRefreshLayout and RecyclerView, item_app.xml for list items, activity_download.xml with progress bar and SHA-256 display
Created AppListAdapter with ViewHolder pattern for displaying app items in RecyclerView
Created MainActivity with RecyclerView setup, ViewModel integration, SwipeRefreshLayout, and error handling
Created DownloadActivity with file download, progress tracking, SHA-256 display, Shizuku permission handling, and file copy to app data
Created strings.xml with app name and UI string resources
Created proguard-rules.pro with rules for data models, OkHttp, Gson, Kotlin serialization, and Shizuku
